name: Template Builder
description: Template for creating new templates. Fill in the variables and send to Claude Code.

name: Snippet Builder
description: Template for creating new snippets. Fill in the variables and send to Claude Code.

name: Workflow Step Template
description: Select this to create a template for use in workflow steps (includes {previous_output})
content:
CHOICE: Workflow Step Template

This template will include {previous_output} as the first variable, allowing it to use output from previous workflow steps.

Best for: Processing, refining, or transforming output from earlier steps in a workflow.

name: First Step Template
description: Select this to create a template for the first step of a workflow (standalone input)
content:
CHOICE: First Step Template

This template will NOT include {previous_output} and is designed to be the starting point of a workflow with its own input variables.

Best for: Initial content creation, data input, or starting a new process.
